snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Friday, selections include a satirical dinner with a smartphone, changes to Amazon’s publishing business and a report of slow sales for...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Friday, selections include a satirical dinner with a smartphone, changes to Amazon’s publishing business and a report of slow sales for Microsoft’s tablet.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Amazon Publishing and Surface Sales
